release_note: Bug fixes
Minor improvements
Updated for the latest OS and devices
Minor UI fixes
UI layout fixes
Minor bug fixes
Improved support for new devices.
Support for iOS 12
Fixed zoom limits on iPad Pro 10
Display page numbers above 100 correctly
Fixed an issue with popups on iPhone Plus.
Support for iOS 11
Added a Try Inkflow Plus file.
Performance improvements.
fixed some text layout issues.
Swipe pages on iPhone: Swipe from the edges of the screen to switch pages can be disabled in App Settings .

Split screen multitasking on iPad: Work side by side with your documents web pages videos or books. Replaced the sliding toolbar with an adaptive toolbar on iPhone: Fewer taps to get to the most common tools. Improved Pencil palm rejection and Pencil only drawing mode: Turn it on and rest your palm with impunity. iOS 10 support.
Higher resolution edited images. Improved palm rejection. Fix sliding toolbar on 3D Touch devices.
Support for iPad Pro and Apple Pencil. Separate color setting for each tool. Improved palm rejection. Searchable file names in Spotlight.
Compatibility with iPhone 6S and 6S Plus.
More color slots on iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus. Improved Export PDF and Image dialog. Inkflow now uses the standard image picker with a new setting to toggle adjusting inserted images.
Bug fixes around inserting images.

New Inkflow Plus features: The Single Color Eraser. Toggle this in the palette to only erase the selected color. Directly adjust the pen width on the iPhone. Free for all new and existing Inkflow Plus users. Thanks for upgrading!
Add support for the iPad Air 2 which adds a whole new world of performance!

The iOS8 Release! New in v3.8: Support for iOS8 and the larger iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus screens. Inkflow Plus: Export as PNG with transparent backgrounds. Great for inserting into other compositions saving a few steps in your workflow. Inkflow Plus: Full font picker on the iPhone. Enjoy 50 fonts. You can now long press on a book in the Gallery to access its options. Each version is rated separately. If you enjoy Inkflow please take a moment to rate it again in the App Store. We really appreciate it! Thank you and keep on creating! The Inkflow Team Qrayon.

NEW INKFLOW PLUS TOOL: Introducing the Write Behind Hilighter! It draws behind existing ink. Use it to color within the lines and touch up your drawings. It s a free addition for all Inkflow Plus users because we love you. Enjoy! We also made a few tweaks to the palette interface to give it a cleaner look.
Re mastered for iOS7 with native 64 bit support.
Fixed a bug where saved image snapshots might get mirrored when editing.
Color update for Inkflow Plus on iPad New: Multiple color palettes. Swipe left and right to see more. New: Color eye dropper tool for inks. New: Copy and paste from Vittle to Inkflow.

Adding a couple more oft requested features: You can now copy images from other Apps such as mail and paste them in Inkflow. The Gallery sort order by name or by date is now persisted across sessions. Enjoy! If you like Inkflow please remember to rate us in the App Store each version gets a separate rating . Thanks!
Bug Fixes.

Inkflow v3 is a major update which adds: Inkport Plus iTunes File Sharing An iPad Wrist Guard Change Text Default Styles iPad Picture Rotation with Snap Plus Flipping Ink Plus Tap View Blog to read bookmark the changes in more detail. Each version is rated separately. If you enjoy Inkflow please take a moment to rate it again in the App Store. We really appreciate it! Thanks The Inkflow Team Qrayon.
Bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes.
Bug fixes and performance improvements loading files.
Bug fixes: Fixed a bug where exported JPEGs can appear mirrored and rotated on Windows and some services tip: Rotation EXIF data doesn t get much respect .

This release adds an option for Higher resolution PDF export older devices may not support it and file sizes will be up to 4 times larger . It also fixes several bugs including: iPad3 Retina display bug when running iOS 5 you still need to upgrade to iOS6 to get retina support JPEG export bug on original iPad

Inkflow v2.0 is a major update that adds many popularly requested features: Insert text and edit with the keyboard Add photos from your albums Resize text and photos seamlessly with the ink Paper backgrounds Custom stationery for the Plus Edition. This dramatically expands the scope of what you can do and create with Inkflow while preserving the ease of use and intuitiveness you d expect. We hope you enjoy this new release. If you do please consider taking a moment to rate us in the App Store. We really appreciate it! Keep on creating! The Inkflow Team Qrayon.
Bug fixes and memory optimizations.

v1.6 brings retina iPad support with iOS 6. Sharper lines as smooth as ever. It also takes advantage of the iPhone 5 s larger screen. If you enjoy these updates please consider taking a moment to rate this version in the App Store. We really appreciate it! Best regards The Inkflow Team.

New in v1.4: Export books pdf and pages jpg to other Apps and to print. New in v1.3: Plus Edition for iPhone and iPod Touch! Upgrade today from the actions menu. Reorganized toolbar to make two handed use easier. You can change this in settings. Email books as PDF. High resolution email page as image. Plus Edition Rotate selected ink. We really appreciate all the great feedback and reviews. Please rate this new free update and Tweet to tell your friends about Inkflow!

Thanks for all your five star ratings! Please rate this new update too. This major update brings Plus to the iPhone and adds several new features. New in v1.3: Plus Edition for iPhone and iPod Touch! Upgrade today from the actions menu. Reorganized toolbar to make two handed use easier. You can change this back to the previous orientation in settings. Email books as PDF. Higher resolution email page as image. Plus Edition Rotate selected ink. New in v1.2: Improved memory usage especially on older devices. Added a restore purchase option to the upgrade dialog use this on new devices or after re downloading. We really appreciate all the great feedback and reviews. Please tweet and tell your friends about Inkflow. Warm regards The Inkflow Team at Qrayon

New in v1.2: Thanks for all your five star ratings! This update fixes a few intermittent issues. Improved memory usage especially on older devices. Added a restore purchase option to the upgrade dialog use this on new devices or after re downloading. New in v1.1: New Sliding Toolbar! iPhone users can slide the toolbar to show editing controls in portrait mode. Plus Enhancements: When you select all ink then paste it pastes in the same position as the original. More precise erasing of paint. Bug fixes: Fixed Gallery title display after a search. Fixed occasional flickering when drawing very long lines. Thanks for all the great feedback and reviews. You guys are awesome! We are listening and are working hard to make Inkflow the best Visual Thinking tool available. If you like it please take a moment to rate this new update. We really appreciate it!

New Sliding Toolbar! iPhone users can slide the toolbar to show editing controls in portrait mode. Plus Enhancements: When you select all ink then paste it pastes in the same position as the original. More precise erasing of paint. Bug fixes: Fixed Gallery title display after a search. Fixed occasional flickering when drawing very long lines. Fixed occasional Gallery transition skips. Tweaked some icon images. Thanks for all the great feedback and reviews. You guys are awesome! We are listening and are working hard to make Inkflow the best Visual Thinking tool available. If you like it please take a moment to rate this new update. We really appreciate it!
